name: Beach Rules
description:
Beach Rules will test your memory, visual agility and reflex through various tests. Keep the beach in order and compete in different events and mini-games! CHARACTERISTICS
  • 8 mini games to play against the machine
  • 3 special events: "Scouring the beach", "RCP" and "CleanBot, beach-cleaner"
  • Improve your beach at the end of each round
  • Replay value. Make this summer last forever
  • Special soundtrack
  • "Kawaii" pixel art design
